ABOUT
 
 How to Play Hungry Charlie
 
 Help Charlie go up the river, towards the Pockylate Factory, by tapping on the Pocky box in the bottom row. As you select Charlie's path, Charlie will move up the river so you can always select Charlie's next jump by selecting a tile in the bottom row. Be careful not to tap the water! Charlie cannot swim. 
 
 What is Pocky Stats?
 
 Pocky Stats is a tool that can convert common units into terms of Pocky sticks and boxes. We use the original chocolate Pocky stick and standard 38-stick Pocky box for our conversions. For example, 20g converts to 8.1 Pocky sticks because 8.1 Pocky sticks weighs 20g.
